title: Can't connect to loading screen.
body:
Tried to play a game before and had mass amounts of lag and disconnections.
Reset my modem, closed all other programs, ran speed-test and repaired my client to no avail.

Just tried playing again with my girlfriend (who's on the same connection as me) and we couldn't even get past the loading screen.
Wasted 20 minutes and got a leaver penalty thanks to all of this. I tried to play a custom game and got the same issue, so it doesn't seem to just be a normals thing.

Wondering if anyone else had the same/similar issues

replies.body:
With all these people seemingly getting problems with connecting, you'd think Riot would make an announcement or even a sticky about it?

Nevertheless, have you tried using [Google's Public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4)?

Only thing you can do is run the network tool submit the loggs and hope it helps. 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs
Yep, pretty much - god i hope this is something that fixes itself over night and we're not screwed for months....

Nah its happening to me as well mate.

Was working fine for me this afternoon - getting a "firewall" pop up after champ selection trying to load the game without changing anything on my PC

Even with my firewall off i'm still getting the pop up.
